body_content.explanation: a very large military ship with big guns:
examples: A plane sunk the battleship at sea.
Three submarines attacked the mighty battleship.

body_content.explanation: a game for two people in which they each try to guess the position of marks the other person has placed on a grid (= an arrangement of squares) representing ships and battleships:
examples: One day it rained and we spent all day playing battleships.
Cries of "D-9!" and "You got me!" can be heard as people play Battleship.
